item.title: Resume
item.description: CURT POFF curt dot poff at gmail dot com https://www.linkedin.com/in/cpoff https://github.com/cpoff EXPERIENCE Operations Project Manager at Nike Filter Digital (contractor on-site at Nike campus), May 2016 - Oct. 2017 â€”Led holiday initiatives for Nike.com Global Operations team. Held regular holiday check-ins with distributed geo merchandising teams, support, and in-house capabilities. Shepherded seasonal readiness programs from inception through execution. Developer - Full Stack Javascript Immersion program Portland Code School, May 2015 - Aug.
